title: Allicin from Garlic: Antimicrobial Properties against SIBO
summary: Stabilized allicin (Allimax) shows potent activity against methane and hydrogen-producing bacteria. Effective biofilm disruptor when combined with Neem.

title: Prokinetics in SIBO Treatment: Ginger and Artichoke Extract
summary: Prokinetic therapy stimulates the migrating motor complex (MMC) between meals. Ginger compounds enhance phase III contractions. Artichoke extract improves bile flow.

title: Carnivore Diet and Gut Health: Impact on Microbiome
summary: Zero-fiber carnivore diet can starve hydrogen and methane producing bacteria. Short-term use during kill phase may reduce bacterial load significantly.

title: Neem Extract: Traditional Uses and Modern Applications
summary: Azadirachta indica (Neem) has broad-spectrum antimicrobial properties. Effective against biofilm-forming bacteria. Synergistic with allicin compounds.
